etymology.description: semantic: 水 + phonetic: 酉 (OC *luʔ); 酉 was the original pictogram for this word; 水 was added later to distinguish.
etymology.interpretation: Water indicates a liquid substance, while 酉 provides the sound and depicts a wine vessel, tying the meaning to fermented drinks. The later addition of the water component clarified that the word refers specifically to a liquid alcohol.

examples.chinese: 我不常喝酒(我不常喝酒)。
他带了一瓶米酒去聚会(他帶了一瓶米酒去聚會)。
examples.pinyin: Tā dài le yì píng mǐjiǔ qù jùhuì.
examples.english: He brought a bottle of rice wine to the party.

examples.chinese: 酒后不开车(酒後不開車)。
